title: My RP has disappeared, along with my BE.
body: Just as it says, My RP (which wasn't enough to buy anything) has disappeared along with my BE, any fix for this? I relogged several times but it hasn't fixed it.

replies.body:
The service that operates BE and RP totals per account went down briefly last night. For some it resulted in missing currency and an unresponsive store, for others they may have purchased something but not received it.
If you've purchased something and not received, please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Lol I just made a post about this, I'm glad it wasn't just me but damn it sucks :/
